titleStmt.title: John Larrance to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG5945

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: Your Pettioner would represent that at the fall term of the Equity & Criminal Court in Warren County in 1859 he was fined Sixty dollars. for Selling Spirits contrary to law. the inditement was founded on a witness predjutice against me I had not been in the practice of violating the law and am not now, never keep and tiple Spiritious liquors -- nor never Intend to am a Loyal citizen and law abiding man though poor -- I have never paid the fine from the fact I have not been able to do So and Suport my family I pray your Excelency to remit the fine -- and will ever pray --
Sworn to befor the undersigned Justice of the peace for Warren county by John Larrance this 29th Novr 1864
R. S. Pinvales J. P. W. C.

We the undersigned neighbors and acquaintances of John Larrance represent to your Excelency that we know the petitioner and represent him to be a good citizen a Loyal man peaceable and Industrious with a large family and would respectfully represent him as worthy of Executive Clemency Respt -- yours --

G W Pedigo
Preston Doughty
James Doughty
James M Garman
Jacob Garman
W. H. Pedigo
J H, Pedigo
Louis legrand
B M garman
Nathan legrand
If you can Relieve Mr Smith & Larrane consistently I hope you will do So and confer a favor on them & their familys mail to my adress. Smiths Grove

Warren Equity & Crim Ct
vs
John Larrance
$60.
Tipling
Remitted
7th Jany/65
